plot: A chilling secret is revealed when an old friend reaches out to Mulder and Scully in a seemingly impossible way.

Mulder and Scully are attacked by a private security agency just as they get a video call from Langly, who was supposed to have been dead for 16 years. Helped by Skinner, they manage to escape, get hold of the X-files and learn about the simulation program Langly is now part of. On the second call, Langly begs them to kill the program which was designed by the private agency which the FBI support. Scully and Mulder manage to sneak in the headquarters of the agency and have a shot at destroying the program.—Andreea D
